attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Police are now in the same position as we are and being treated with the same contemp.This government seem determined to upset the people that matter, while letting their real masters in the city get away with tax evasion etc. Perhaps we should all become Scottish citizens to be treated with any form of respect as this is all they seem to care about. More power to the SNP and devolution. Perhaps we can then get our own country back to being run by fellow English people and not by power grabbing elitists from north of the border, who seem determined to destroy this country from within and without (by Europe who hate us as much as the Scots do) are we bothered? I don't think so!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
